title: A2UI Client Event Message
description: A message sent from the client to the server. Exactly ONE of the properties in this object must be set.

userAction.title: User Action
userAction.description: Represents a user-initiated action, sent from the client to the server.

actionName.description: The name of the action, taken from the component's `action.action` property.

sourceComponentId.description: The `id` of the component that triggered the event.

timestamp.description: An ISO 8601 timestamp of when the event occurred.

context.description: A JSON object containing the key-value pairs from the component's `action.context`, after resolving all data bindings.

clientUiCapabilities.title: Client Capabilities
clientUiCapabilities.description: A message from the client describing its capabilities, such as the component catalog it supports. Exactly ONE of the properties in this object must be set.

catalogUri.description: A URI pointing to a predefined component catalog schema.

dynamicCatalog.title: A2UI Catalog
dynamicCatalog.description: A schema that defines a catalog of A2UI components and styles.

components.title: A2UI Components
components.description: A schema that defines a catalog of A2UI components. Each key is a component name, and each value is the JSON schema for that component's properties.

styles.title: A2UI Styles
styles.description: A schema that defines a catalog of A2UI styles. Each key is a style name, and each value is the JSON schema for that style's properties.

error.title: Client Error
error.description: A message from the client indicating an error occurred, for example, during UI rendering.
